name: Alien Rescue - Mission Good Grief - Froglin games
name_original: Alien Rescue - Mission Good Grief - Froglin games
description:
It's the 1950s in Good Grief, Indiana and people have suddenly gotten into several encounters with an odd, round and very alien species. 

In this 3D top-down stealth game, you have to hastily salvage your alien offspring from the curious hands of the strange and capricious humans and not be caught while doing so. 

Key features: 
  • Save your alien kin as fast as possible
  • Use your beam and boost ability to both confuse the enemy and succeed in your mission
  • Get to know every nook and cranny in the Good Grief forest
It’s the 1950’s in the United States of America and the paranoia is high. Roswell incident, Flatwood’s monster and the Red Scare among several others have left the citizens gazing fearfully at the skies - and now they report of something green and alien in the forests. What is that? We cannot cause chaos. They must be taken down and locked up, they say.  You cannot let that happen: you must save your younglings. You speed over from planet Buttocks to Earth - to a town named “Good Grief” in this so-called “country” of “America”.  Rescue your younglings from these strange human creatures, and leave them no trace of your sudden visit. Good luck.
